text: Siɛgi zu é ɠɛni naa wosu da ʋelei Elizé gɔvɛi ta wuzeɠeni la, é kula saai ya, anzanui nii Elizé ná-doun zunui yɛnvui ʋuuni su, naa unkulani masagi ʋɔ bɛ ga naa ɓɔ ba ná-pɛlɛi ta ná-zooiti fai zu. Gaamago Geyazi wooɠulani, é ɠɛ ma: «Wɛlɛ anzanui ʋa gè ɠɛa ná-fai wosu è ma, màliɠii masagi, wɛlɛ ná-doun zunui ɓalaa ba, nii Elizé buzeɠeni, é kula saai ya.»
